welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Goulds, where the charm of small-town America meets southern hospitality. Known for its rich history and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tamiami Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Tamiami Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Miami International Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The Central Terminal at Miami International Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Miami International Airport serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dade Collier Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dade Collier Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Opa Locka Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
